articles.title: Watch the sun set over the moon in epic video from private Blue Ghost lunar lander - Space.com
articles.description: Firefly Aerospace's Blue Ghost moon lander captured amazing views of the lunar sunset shortly before shutting down on Sunday (March 16).
articles.content:
Firefly Aerospace's Blue Ghost lunar lander made the most of its last few hours of life on the moon.
